title: Help me ðŸ¤¤
body:
So I took a 3 year break from lol and on return I suck so much. I played a ton in preseason season 4 and peaked at plat 3 however took a break and decayed to gold 3 that season. Have only just returned to league last week and suck so much. (During this time i let my brother play on my account as I had no need for it) 

I even played on my smurf (20ish games) and am at 9 wins 12 losses. I feel like I don't know what half these otems are now with all these reworks. Buffs and nerfs make champions I was comfortable on seem so foreign. 

I'm going to try hard this season so I'm sure I will improve.  Just feels bad going even in lane with bronze players when I remember  crushing them 2 years ago. 

Have been trting to one trick tahm kench top but he feels very clunky and slow. 

Thinking I may one trick dianna. 

Thoughts and advice guys?

replies.body: Diana is an OK pick especially for low mmr. But there are just way better champions than her both in mid and jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=WildHamster,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=e9qujcpO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-27T01:45:51.830+0000)
>
> Diana is an OK pick especially for low mmr. But there are just way better champions than her both in mid and jungle.

yep, diana is countered easily in higher elo, probably diamond above. Diana is still good in some plat games but not all, some plat players are really exceptionally good

The game plays so differently now, and not in a good way.

I suggest just playing a whole bunch of champs, and then focusing on what works for you, rather than trying to force a choice.
